title: Many Hugs, My Lady
overview: A rich girl who miraculously survived an attempt on her life decides to simulate amnesia and moves to a farm in the northeast of Thailand. She has to make an alliance with the "villain", forcing him to enter into a fictitious marriage, as well as to compete with her mother-in-law and her candidate for the ideal daughter-in-law. In addition, the girl will have to find the cipher from the safe of the mysteriously missing mother.
